com.soa.console.binding

Class BindingContextLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soa.console.binding.BindingContextLoader

  • public class BindingContextLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    The BindingContextLoader is used to retrieve and set binding context from the servlet request context.
    Since:
    6.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BindingContext getBindingContext(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Retrieve binding context given HTTP servlet request.
      static BindingContextLoader getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the BindingContextLoader.
      void setBindingContext(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, BindingContext context)
      Set binding context in HTTP servlet request.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
